sentences.en: Cadmium is a good metal for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 镉是适合这一目的的优良金属.

sentences.en: Cadmium Red LIGHT HueWe are Charlton Mills a retail store featuring craft supplies and shipping materials.
sentences.cn: Cadmium红色光HueWe集装箱是查尔顿米尔斯零售商店,拥有工艺用品和运输包装材料.

sentences.en: Cadmium sulphide or cadmium selenide in polymer based thin film transistor.
sentences.cn: 聚化合物薄膜电晶体内的硫化镉或硒化镉.

sentences.en: Cadmium waste streams from the industries mainly end up in soils.
sentences.cn: 工业中的废弃的镉一般流失到土壤里.

sentences.en: Certificate: En 71, ASTM D, Low lead, Low Cadmium, Phthalate free.
sentences.cn: 证书：En 71，ASTM D，低铅，低镉，无邻苯二甲酸盐。

sentences.en: Earthworms and other essential soil organisms are extremely susceptive to cadmium poisoning.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓和其他主要的土壤生物都非常容易镉中毒.

sentences.en: EU clamps down on heavy metal cadmium in batteries.
sentences.cn: 欧盟限制在电池中使用重金属镉.

sentences.en: External labels shall also be attached with cadmium plated screws.
sentences.cn: 外部标签也应该附加镀镉螺丝.

sentences.en: In this paper, brush plating cadmium for aircraft structure parts was investigated.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了刷镀镉技术在飞机高强度钢结构件表面损伤修复中的应用.

sentences.en: It is better if used together with cadmium, zinc and epoxy compound.
sentences.cn: 与镉皂 、 锌皂和环氧化合物并用有良好的协同效应.

sentences.en: Of the total industrial cadmium use, 90 % is utilized in electroplating and pigments.
sentences.cn: 工业用镉总量的90%用于电镀和涂料.

sentences.en: Some microbes like nothing better than to be nestled in a toxic sludge of heavy metals like zinc, arsenic and cadmium.
sentences.cn: 对于一些微生物而言，没有什么比生活在充满了锌、砷和镉之类的重金属的有毒淤泥中更加惬意的。

sentences.en: The block is surrounded by cadmium foil 0.5 mm thick.
sentences.cn: 支架周围有一层0.5毫米厚的镉箔.

sentences.en: The cadmium pollution in feed has attracted more and more attention.
sentences.cn: 饲料中的镉污染问题越来越受到人们的关注.

sentences.en: The new standards adopted will go a long way towards protecting human health, as they set out new, maximum limits for lead in fish, cadmium in rice, marine bivalve molluscs and cephalopods.
sentences.cn: 通过的这些新标准将对保护人类健康大有帮助，因为它们提出鱼类中铅以及大米、海洋双壳贝类和头足类动物中镉的新的最高限量。

sentences.en: There are various techniques and equipment for raw cadmium refining.
sentences.cn: 粗镉精炼有多种方法,设备也各有千秋.

sentences.en: When people breathe in cadmium it can severely damage the lungs.
sentences.cn: 吸烟的时候会把镉输送到肺部.

trans.tran_en: a soft poisonous metal that is used in  batteries  and in the protective  shield s  in  nuclear reactor s  . It is a chemical  element  : symbol Cd
